## isObject variable

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

检测给定值是否为对象

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isObject: any
```

## Remarks

检测给定值是否为对象；如果是，返回 true，否则返回 false。

## Example

传入值为对象，返回 true。

```
isObject({}) -> true

```
传入值为非对象，返回 false。

```
isObject('') -> false

```
